data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 823,600 citizens of Bình Phước, Vietnam, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bình Phước, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Bình Phước, Vietnam need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Bình Phước to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Bình Phước, Vietnam to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Bih people. Make the Bih people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 17,814 believers in Bình Phước, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Bình Phước, Vietnam.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Bình Phước, Vietnam know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
